metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14397 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. libvncserver/rfbregion.c has a NULL pointer dereference.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14397` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libvncserver-config - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libvncserver1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

vino - 3.22.0-3ubuntu1.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3').
vino package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-3ubuntu1.1').
x11vnc package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
